snippet.title: Three Bulky Bears Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The evil witch Rolldilocks has kicked the Three Bears out of their home! In this unique 2D platformer, switch between Baby Bear, Mama Bear, and Papa Bear to navigate a variety of obstacles, as you roll, jump, swim, and smash your way through dozens of challenging levels! 

Master the mechanics to improve your time on each level, rise up the leaderboards, and earn each level's gold star!

Buy today on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2957270/Three_Bulky_Bears/

And join our community Discord server for updates and to talk about the game! https://discord.gg/TRwkVhHWc5
